name: Super Drop Land
description:
Drop into an adventure!

Super Drop Land is a platformer that drops you into an unforgettable vertical adventure! Collect, chase and flip your way down through each land, but stay clear of the ghosts!

KEY FEATURES
- Fall, flip and chase your way through 10 different lands with different twists and themes.
- Use your quick thinking and smart moves to collect points to level up and to progress to the next level!
- Unlock more than 15 new puzzles, hats that give you SPECIAL POWERS, colourful costumes and more!
- Watch out for spooky ghosts while chasing rabbits and catching puppies. Oh, don't forget to chase your high score too!
- Feeling competitive? Find the Racing Crown and dive into a brand new mode where you can race against each other to the bottom!

Download FREE and start your adventure today! See you at the bottom!

IMPORTANT NOTICE
This game contains in-app purchases. You can disable this feature in the settings menu of your device.
